parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds an column at given position. It returns the index of the newly added column.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> _ctrl [[lnbAddColumn]] position
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> _ctrl: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] or [[nil]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> [[lnbAddColumn]] [idc([[Number]]) or [[Control]],position([[Number]])]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [idc([[Number]]) or [[Control]],position([[Number]])]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] or [[nil]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbAddColumn]] 0.8;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbAddColumn]] [105,0.8];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 9 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note"><template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.28</value></part></template> Horizontal coordinates of columns were added relative to list width, in range from 0 to 1. 
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
